title: "A  Real Challenge"  bug'd
body:
i bought championship ashe   ath the launch and played with it a bit , i completed some quests then the next day i got the Championship Pass. 
now i have to complete "A real Challenge " and im stuck at 3/4 quests . 

no more quests are given  and it has  been 3 days .  what is going on ?

replies.body:
the mission "A real challenger" is stuck on 1/4 complete and there are no more missions to do. I have already four missions completed.
Fight for glory
Teamwork - Objective controll
Skill - Quick to win
Welcome to worlds

Will there be more missions later on or is it just bugged? It has been like this for several days since those missions first got released.
I'm experiencing the same issue, stuck on 3/4 of it done. i paid for the Worlds master pass and i cant even do missions? **REALLY DISSAPPOINTED **{{champion:516}}
I've also been having this problem for the past 3 days or so now and it's getting extremely irritating.
I have the same problem. Can someone help me?

I have the same problem. 1/4 no more missions to do. it's been 3 days and i refreshed my client many time.
I need help, ty.

Sometimes these missions can take a little bit before they get properly recorded. Make sure you refresh your client just in case that's preventing it from updating and let me know if it still hasn't completed tonight!
